body:
For more detailed setup instructions, see https://rules-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/getting-started.html

For the user-facing changelog see [here](https://rules-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html#v1-5-1)

## Using Bzlmod

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_python", version = "1.5.1")

python = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:python.bzl", "python")
python.toolchain(
    python_version = "3.13",
)

pip = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:pip.bzl", "pip")
pip.parse(
    hub_name = "pypi",
    python_version = "3.13",
    requirements_lock = "//:requirements_lock.txt",
)

use_repo(pip, "pypi")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_python",
    sha256 = "fa532d635f29c038a64c8062724af700c30cf6b31174dd4fac120bc561a1a560",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.5.1",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.5.1/rules_python-1.5.1.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories")

py_repositories()
```

### Gazelle plugin

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_python_gazelle_plugin",
    sha256 = "fa532d635f29c038a64c8062724af700c30cf6b31174dd4fac120bc561a1a560",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.5.1/gazelle",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.5.1/rules_python-1.5.1.tar.gz",
)

# To compile the rules_python gazelle extension from source,
# we must fetch some third-party go dependencies that it uses.

load("@rules_python_gazelle_plugin//:deps.bzl", _py_gazelle_deps = "gazelle_deps")

_py_gazelle_deps()
```


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/compare/1.5.0...1.5.1

For more detailed setup instructions, see https://rules-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/getting-started.html

For the user-facing changelog see [here](https://rules-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html#v1-5-0)

## Using Bzlmod

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_python", version = "1.5.0")

python = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:python.bzl", "python")
python.toolchain(
    python_version = "3.13",
)

pip = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:pip.bzl", "pip")
pip.parse(
    hub_name = "pypi",
    python_version = "3.13",
    requirements_lock = "//:requirements_lock.txt",
)

use_repo(pip, "pypi")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_python",
    sha256 = "7b9039c31e909cf59eeaea8ccbdc54f09f7ebaeb9609b94371c7de45e802977c",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.5.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.5.0/rules_python-1.5.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories")

py_repositories()
```

### Gazelle plugin

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_python_gazelle_plugin",
    sha256 = "7b9039c31e909cf59eeaea8ccbdc54f09f7ebaeb9609b94371c7de45e802977c",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.5.0/gazelle",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.5.0/rules_python-1.5.0.tar.gz",
)

# To compile the rules_python gazelle extension from source,
# we must fetch some third-party go dependencies that it uses.

load("@rules_python_gazelle_plugin//:deps.bzl", _py_gazelle_deps = "gazelle_deps")

_py_gazelle_deps()
```


## What's Changed
* fix: declare PyInfo as provided by test/binary/library by @layus in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2777
* fix: load target_platforms through the hub by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2781
* chore: remove a stray file by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2795
* build(deps): bump sphinx-rtd-theme from 3.0.1 to 3.0.2 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2802
* build(deps): bump astroid from 3.3.6 to 3.3.9 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2803
* build(deps): bump packaging from 24.2 to 25.0 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2804
* fix: fixes to prepare for making bootstrap=script the default for Linux by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2760
* fix: escape more invalid repo string characters by @keith in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2801
* fix: parsing metadata with inline licenses by @keith in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2806
* test(pypi): add a test case for simpleapi html parsing with % by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2811
* build: Run pre-commit everywhere by @brandonchinn178 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2808
* refactor/docs: improve compile_pip_requirements error message and docs by @brandonchinn178 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2792
* feat: Have `pip_compile` generate a `*.test` target; deprecate `*_test` by @dougthor42 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2812
* fix: try multiple times to get win32 version to handle flakes by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2814
* refactor: Add log_std(out|err) bools to repo_utils that execute a subprocess by @dougthor42 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2817
* fix: use the python micro version to parse whl metadata in bzlmod by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2793
* fix(pypi): call python --version before marker eval by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2819
* docs: add xrefs for local toolchains rules by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2823
* docs: Improve bazel-runfiles docs by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2824
* revert(pypi): bring back Python PEP508 code with tests by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2831
* fix(pypi) backport python_full_version fix to Python by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2833
* revert(pypi): use Python for marker eval and METADATA parsing by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2834
* feat: implement less/greater operators for string for env marker evaluation by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2827
* docs: doc version when RULES_PYTHON_ENABLE_PYSTAR was introduced by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2838
* fix(pypi): handle more URL patterns for requirement sources by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2843
* docs: document some of our project styles/conventions by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2816
* fix: requires_file preserves extras that package depends on by @skongum02 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2807
* refactor: add rule to do analysis time evaluation of environment markers by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2832
* py_wheel: always generate zip64-capable wheels by @devtbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2711
* feat: allow specifying arbitrary constraints for local toolchains by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2829
* feat: add an env variable to toggle pipstar by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2855
* fix: add target platform to extra exec platforms in analysis tests by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2861
* fix: configure coverage helpers for test exec group by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2857
* fix: fix test analysis error on macOS arm64 by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2860
* refactor: make env marker config available through target and flag by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2853
* feat: default to bootstrap script for non-windows by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2858
* fix(pypi): fix a typo in parse_simpleapi_html by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2866
* build(deps): bump more-itertools from 10.5.0 to 10.7.0 in /tools/publish by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2841
* fix(pypi): finish PEP508/PEP440 impl for version matching by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2856
* tests: make some analysis tests work for when test's exec platform is required by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2869
* fix(pypi): make the URL/filename extraction from requirement more robust by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2871
* feat(pypi): actually start using env_marker_setting by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2873
* refactor: make python extension generate platform toolchains by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2875
* Fix whl_library file path inference by @gholms in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2876
* refactor: consolidate version parsing by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2874
* feat: Add support for REPLs by @philsc in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2723
* cleanup: remove unused sanitize_platform_name function by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2887
* refactor: move inline code strings to top-level constants by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2886
* dev: add .python-version file so pyenv isn't user/system specific by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2883
* refactor: have bzlmod pass platforms to python_register_toolchains by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2884
* sphinxdocs: close repo rule directives by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2892
* sphinxdocs: make xrefs to bzl:obj in inventories work by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2894
* sphinxdocs: make xrefs to tag class attributes using attr role work by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2895
* sphinxdocs: allow unqualified arg/attr name for xref by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2896
* docs: fix xref to toolchain docs from getting starting by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2899
* sphinxdocs: allow files to be xref by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2897
* docs: move devguide to sphinx for more powerful markup by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2898
* sphinxdocs: make bazel package xrefs work by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2903
* docs: fix most broken xrefs in changelog by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2902
* tests: move py_reconfig rules to their own file by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2900
* docs: fix link to py_reconfig and sh_py_run_test files by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2901
* sphinxdocs: make Any and object types no-ops to avoid missing xrefs by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2905
* docs: correct some xrefs, add various missing Bazel external xrefs by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2907
* docs: ignore warnings about missing external py xrefs by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2904
* refactor: make bzlmod directly aware of created toolchain repo names by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2885
* fix: Allow PYTHONSTARTUP to define variables by @philsc in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2911
* docs: fix some more bad xrefs by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2910
* refactor: make bzlmod create host repos for toolchains by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2888
* refactor: remove unused target_platforms hub_repository attr by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2912
* build(deps): bump setuptools from 65.6.3 to 78.1.1 in /examples/bzlmod by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2914
* refactor: make bzlmod pass platform mapping to host repo creation by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2889
* docs: fix xrefs in  by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2917
* refactor: explicitly define host platform ordering by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2890
* docs: generate docs for py_common, PyInfoBuilder APIs by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2920
* refactor: rename host_toolchain rule to host_compatible_python_repo by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2926
* docs/refactor: Use python.defaults, not is_default by @vonschultz in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2924
* fix: Normalize main script path in Python bootstrap by @mering in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2925
* refactor: also rename host toolchain impl function name by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2930
* tests: refactor py_reconfig rules so less boilerplate is needed to add attrs by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2933
* feat: add shebang attribute on py_console_script_binary by @chrisirhc in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2867
* fix: update the stub type alias names by @kaycebasques in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2929
* refactor: reimplement writing namespace pkgs in Starlark by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2882
* cleanup(pycross): remove the partially migrated code by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2906
* refactor(pypi): return a list from parse_requirements by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2931
* fix: symlink root-level python files to the venv by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2908
* docs: split PyPI docs up and add more by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2935
* refactor: change site_packages_symlinks to venv_symlinks by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2939
* docs: fix sphinxdocs mis-redirect by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2940
* feat: allow custom platform when overriding by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2880
* feat: Support constraints in pip_compile by @vihangm in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2916
* fix(pypi): allow pip_compile to work with read-only sources by @rbeasley-avgo in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2712
* feat(uv): handle credential helpers and .netrc by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2872
* fix(pypi): correctly aggregate the requirements files by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2932
* fix(pypi): inherit proxy env variables in compile_pip_requirements test by @herewasmike in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2941
* feat: add persistent worker for sphinxdocs by @kaycebasques in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2938
* fix: Updating setuptools to patch CVE-2025-47273 by @aaronmaxlevy in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2955
* feat: data and pyi files in the venv by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2936
* fix(pypi): Only show index_url_overrides warnings when they are needed by @thirtyseven in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2967
* revert: change default bootstrap back to system_python by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2968
* fix: grammar in an error message by @benjaminp in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2971
* refactor: Add missing uses of DefaultInfo by @keith in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2972
* docs: fix typo in toolchains.md example code by @honglooker in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2970
* chore: prepare for 1.5 release by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2973
* fix: support pre-release versions and add new toolchain versions by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2969

## Using Bzlmod

name: 1.5.0-rc2
body:
For more detailed setup instructions, see https://rules-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/getting-started.html

For the user-facing changelog see [here](https://rules-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html#v1-5-0-rc2)

## Using Bzlmod

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_python", version = "1.5.0-rc2")

python = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:python.bzl", "python")
python.toolchain(
    python_version = "3.13",
)

pip = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:pip.bzl", "pip")
pip.parse(
    hub_name = "pypi",
    python_version = "3.13",
    requirements_lock = "//:requirements_lock.txt",
)

use_repo(pip, "pypi")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_python",
    sha256 = "4de9058c51b2b0f2494a38bd8630d8fb7f6d43278d10e95aa784b1f161f67e2b",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.5.0-rc2",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.5.0-rc2/rules_python-1.5.0-rc2.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories")

py_repositories()
```

### Gazelle plugin

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_python_gazelle_plugin",
    sha256 = "4de9058c51b2b0f2494a38bd8630d8fb7f6d43278d10e95aa784b1f161f67e2b",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.5.0-rc2/gazelle",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.5.0-rc2/rules_python-1.5.0-rc2.tar.gz",
)

# To compile the rules_python gazelle extension from source,
# we must fetch some third-party go dependencies that it uses.

load("@rules_python_gazelle_plugin//:deps.bzl", _py_gazelle_deps = "gazelle_deps")

_py_gazelle_deps()
```


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/compare/1.5.0-rc1...1.5.0-rc2

For the user-facing changelog see [here](https://rules-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html#v1-4-1)

## Using Bzlmod

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_python", version = "1.4.1")

python = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:python.bzl", "python")
python.toolchain(
    python_version = "3.13",
)

pip = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:pip.bzl", "pip")
pip.parse(
    hub_name = "pypi",
    python_version = "3.13",
    requirements_lock = "//:requirements_lock.txt",
)

use_repo(pip, "pypi")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_python",
    sha256 = "9f9f3b300a9264e4c77999312ce663be5dee9a56e361a1f6fe7ec60e1beef9a3",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.4.1",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.4.1/rules_python-1.4.1.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories")

py_repositories()
```

### Gazelle plugin

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_python_gazelle_plugin",
    sha256 = "9f9f3b300a9264e4c77999312ce663be5dee9a56e361a1f6fe7ec60e1beef9a3",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.4.1/gazelle",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.4.1/rules_python-1.4.1.tar.gz",
)

# To compile the rules_python gazelle extension from source,
# we must fetch some third-party go dependencies that it uses.

load("@rules_python_gazelle_plugin//:deps.bzl", _py_gazelle_deps = "gazelle_deps")

_py_gazelle_deps()
```

## Using Bzlmod

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_python", version = "1.3.0-rc1")

python = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:python.bzl", "python")
python.toolchain(
    python_version = "3.13",
)

pip = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:pip.bzl", "pip")
pip.parse(
    hub_name = "pypi",

    requirements_lock = "//:requirements_lock.txt",
)

use_repo(pip, "pypi")
```

```starlark
http_archive(

    sha256 = "069b14defc462c1382d4d8f00c25eb59dc468e38d6c932471312d466fdf7700b",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.3.0-rc1",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.3.0-rc1/rules_python-1.3.0-rc1.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories")
```

### Gazelle plugin

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_python_gazelle_plugin",

    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.3.0-rc1/gazelle",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.3.0-rc1/rules_python-1.3.0-rc1.tar.gz",
)

# To compile the rules_python gazelle extension from source,
# we must fetch some third-party go dependencies that it uses.

_py_gazelle_deps()
```

* fix(pypi): use python -B for repo-phase invocations by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2641

## What's Changed
* docs: Add horizontal spacers around filenames in custom toolchain guide by @nicholasjng in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2563
* fix: Avoid creating URLs with empty path segments from index URLs in environment variables by @WillMorrison in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2557
* docs: update gazelle README.md by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2567
* fix: Don't fail in override from a non-root module by @mailto-jonas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2566
* chore: remove internal usage of deprecated py_binary ad py_test by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2569
* fix: Fix encoding of runfiles manifest and repository mapping files. by @phst in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2568
* fix: make coverage work with bootstrap=script by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2574
* doc: point users to our CHANGELOG at the top of the release note by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2582
* fix: Enable location expansion for `sh_py_run_test` by @philsc in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2583
* fix(sphinxdocs): do not crash when tag_class does not have doc by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2585
* refactor(uv): move around uv implementation files by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2580
* revert: Updated pip and packaging versions to work with free-threading packages (#2514) by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2584
* docs: using python_version attribute for specifying python version by @JeroenSchmidt in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2589
* fix: make plain zipapp work with bootstrap=script by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2598
* fix: add flag to use runtime venv creation when using bootstrap=script by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2590
* docs: Update URL in gazelle example by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2602
* refactor: expose base rule construction via builders to allow customization for testing by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2600
* feat: Remove and redirect py_proto_library to protobuf by @comius in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2604
* chore: updates for 1.2.0 release by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2611

For more detailed setup instructions, see https://rules-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/getting-started.html

## Using Bzlmod

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_python", version = "1.1.0-rc1")

pip = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:pip.bzl", "pip")

pip.parse(
    hub_name = "pip",
    python_version = "3.11",
    requirements_lock = "//:requirements_lock.txt",
)

use_repo(pip, "pip")
```

## What's Changed
* docs: fix refs to precompile source retention flag/attr in precompiling docs by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2419
* refactor: Add GAZELLE_VERBOSE env and log parser failures by @dougthor42 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2420
* refactor(toolchain): use bazel to extract `zstd` archives by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2412
* refactor!(toolchain): remove uname dep in the repository_rule stage by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2406
* fix(pypi): handle multiple versions of the same package when parsing requirements files by @ewianda in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2377
* fix(uv): Fix sha256 for uv binary for aarch64-apple-darwin by @schultetwin in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2422
* feat(musl): add musl toolchain by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2402
* chore: extra code removals before 1.0 by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2421
* feat(pypi):  Add extra_hub_aliases to pip_repository too by @gholms in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2426
* chore!(pip.parse): remove parse_all_requirements_files attribute by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2407
* chore(gazelle): Rename GAZELLE_VERBOSE env var; use idiomatic go; add comments by @dougthor42 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2428
* fix: make sys.executable work with script bootstrap by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2409
* tests: make workspace CI jobs enable workspace mode by @comius in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2435
* fix: use com_google_protobuf in WORKSPACE by @comius in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2432
* chore: add dougthor42 as one of the gazelle owners by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2427
* ci: rm the lock file testing by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2430
* tests: make some tests compatible with Bazel 9 fix various tests relying on Bazel builtin providers existing by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2433
* refactor(pypi): move config setting processing to the macro by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2424
* chore: rename the dev-only setup files to more clearly self-describe what they are by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2436
* fix: correctly obtain relative path required for the venv created by `--bootstrap_impl=script` by @chowder in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2439
* fix: Propagate common kwargs to sphinx_run by @tpudlik in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2442
* fix: upgrade to bazel_features 1.21.0 for Bazel 8 rc3 support by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2440
* fix(render_pkg_aliases): correctly render when we have target_platforms set by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2447
* deps: upgrade to stardoc 0.7.2 for Bazel 8 support by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2451
* chore: auto compute prelease setting by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2452
* feat(runfiles): add support for spaces and newlines in runfiles paths by @dizzy57 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2456
* fix: upgrade to rules_bazel_integration_test 0.27.0 for bazel 9 compatibility by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2454
* doc: improve alias error msg in pip hubs by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2458

name: 1.0.0-rc2
body:
For more detailed setup instructions, see https://rules-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/getting-started.html

## Using Bzlmod

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_python", version = "1.0.0-rc2")

pip = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:pip.bzl", "pip")

pip.parse(
    hub_name = "pip",
    python_version = "3.11",
    requirements_lock = "//:requirements_lock.txt",
)

use_repo(pip, "pip")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_python",
    sha256 = "95496eb8b14a134b985844cbabe3d67a0caaff02ff07fe6d3aafe232e970bfae",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.0.0-rc2",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/releases/download/1.0.0-rc2/rules_python-1.0.0-rc2.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories")

py_repositories()
```

### Gazelle plugin

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_python_gazelle_plugin",
    sha256 = "95496eb8b14a134b985844cbabe3d67a0caaff02ff07fe6d3aafe232e970bfae",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.0.0-rc2/gazelle",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/releases/download/1.0.0-rc2/rules_python-1.0.0-rc2.tar.gz",
)

# To compile the rules_python gazelle extension from source,
# we must fetch some third-party go dependencies that it uses.

load("@rules_python_gazelle_plugin//:deps.bzl", _py_gazelle_deps = "gazelle_deps")

_py_gazelle_deps()
```

## What's Changed
* fix(render_pkg_aliases): correctly render when we have target_platforms set by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2447
* deps: upgrade to stardoc 0.7.2 for Bazel 8 support by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2451
* chore: auto compute prelease setting by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2452
* feat(runfiles): add support for spaces and newlines in runfiles paths by @dizzy57 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2456
* fix: upgrade to rules_bazel_integration_test 0.27.0 for bazel 9 compatibility by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2454


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/compare/1.0.0-rc1...1.0.0-rc2

## What's Changed
* docs: fix refs to precompile source retention flag/attr in precompiling docs by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2419

* chore(gazelle): Rename GAZELLE_VERBOSE env var; use idiomatic go; add comments by @dougthor42 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2428
* fix: make sys.executable work with script bootstrap by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2409
* tests: make workspace CI jobs enable workspace mode by @comius in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2435
* fix: use com_google_protobuf in WORKSPACE by @comius in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2432
* chore: add dougthor42 as one of the gazelle owners by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2427

## Using Bzlmod

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_python", version = "0.37.2")

pip = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:pip.bzl", "pip")

pip.parse(
    hub_name = "pip",
    python_version = "3.11",
    requirements_lock = "//:requirements_lock.txt",
)

use_repo(pip, "pip")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_python",
    sha256 = "c6fb25d0ba0246f6d5bd820dd0b2e66b339ccc510242fd4956b9a639b548d113",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-0.37.2",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/releases/download/0.37.2/rules_python-0.37.2.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories")

py_repositories()
```

### Gazelle plugin

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_python_gazelle_plugin",
    sha256 = "c6fb25d0ba0246f6d5bd820dd0b2e66b339ccc510242fd4956b9a639b548d113",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-0.37.2/gazelle",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/releases/download/0.37.2/rules_python-0.37.2.tar.gz",
)

# To compile the rules_python gazelle extension from source,
# we must fetch some third-party go dependencies that it uses.

load("@rules_python_gazelle_plugin//:deps.bzl", _py_gazelle_deps = "gazelle_deps")

_py_gazelle_deps()
```


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/compare/0.37.1...0.37.2
